constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 93 (Friday, May 27, 2022)]
[House]
[Pages H5220-H5221]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KELLY of Mississippi:
H.R. 7889.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H5221]]
Article I, Section 8, clause 12 provides Congress with the
power to raise and support armies, and provide and maintain a
navy.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: Military Fitness Incentive Tuition Act
